ThingDef.label: black dragon
ThingDef.description: Black dragons overshadow all other dragons in terms of ferocity, even compared to the red dragon. Which is why they are incredibly hard to tame and very dangerous, simply too wild to use in war. The altar rituals effect these dragons.

li.label: Fire Breath
li.description: A large fire breath that scorches the earth and everything else.

li.label: Dragon Spit
li.description: Spit a ball of fire onto your foes

ThingDef.label: blue dragon
ThingDef.description: Blue dragons are found in colder climates and their main source of energy comes from fish, this is due to the lack of larger prey in those areas. They are known to be a dragon of kinder temper, gladly accepting gifts and offerings. The altar rituals effect these dragons.

li.label: Fire Breath
li.description: A large fire breath that scorches the earth and everything else.

li.label: Dragon Spit
li.description: Spit a ball of fire onto your foes

ThingDef.label: green dragon
ThingDef.description: Green dragons were one of the first dragons used for war. Common, easy to tame, and easy to train, they were used to transport large amounts of soldiers quickly. The altar rituals effect these dragons.

li.label: Fire Breath
li.description: A large fire breath that scorches the earth and everything else.

li.label: Dragon Spit
li.description: Spit a ball of fire onto your foes

ThingDef.label: purple dragon
ThingDef.description: Purple dragons were originally bred in captivity by combining red and blue varieties. It wasn't until a tribe member, Venn, released them from captivity that they became free, roaming the Rimworld as wild dragons. The altar rituals effect these dragons.

li.label: Fire Breath
li.description: A large fire breath that scorches the earth and everything else.

li.label: Dragon Spit
li.description: Spit a ball of fire onto your foes

ThingDef.label: red dragon
ThingDef.description: Red dragons have been known to fight with great strength, making them useful as living war machines. Many escaped their chains due to a tribesman, Curro, secretly freeing them whenever she could. Many have since returned to the wild. The altar rituals effect these dragons.

li.label: Fire Breath
li.description: A large fire breath that scorches the earth and everything else.

li.label: Dragon Spit
li.description: Spit a ball of fire onto your foes

ThingDef.label: white dragon
ThingDef.description: White dragons are a mysterious species, native to the coldest of climates and extremely territorial, they try ward off all who attempt to observe them. The altar rituals effect these dragons.

li.label: Fire Breath
li.description: A large fire breath that scorches the earth and everything else.

li.label: Dragon Spit
li.description: Spit a ball of fire onto your foes

ThingDef.label: yellow dragon
ThingDef.description: Yellow dragons are the newest dragons to have been seen in the wild. A rare dominant mutation created a new strain of dragon that developed into its own race. The altar rituals effect these dragons.

li.label: Fire Breath
li.description: A large fire breath that scorches the earth and everything else.

li.label: Dragon Spit
li.description: Spit a ball of fire onto your foes
